name: setup-msstore-cli
description: Setup Microsoft Store Developer CLI GitHub Action

scripts.copy-license: copy setup-msstore-cli-task/licenses.txt licenses.txt || cp setup-msstore-cli-task/licenses.txt licenses.txt
scripts.create-tfx: npm run copy-license && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.package-ado: ncc build lib/src/azure-devops-task.js --source-map --license licenses.txt -o setup-msstore-cli-task && npm run create-tfx
scripts.package: npm run package-gha && npm run package-ado
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package && npm test
